message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to both of us.  Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I would like to propose a lower price of $750,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but $750,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit to $850,000, considering your interest.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement close to this number.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I am able to offer $825,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
